THEY ENDED IT ON A CLIF HANGER!!!

[h1]TLDR: Episode 1 and 2 represent Valve at the absolute peak of their craft. Episode 1 aims to improve on HL²'s storytelling and set-pieces which is a tall order, and it does just that incredibly well. Its only flaw is that it is too short, but it's all killer, no filler.[/h1] 

Episode 1 is peak Valve. HL² was great - and still is - but it wasn't perfect for sure. This Episode addresses a lot of issues people had with HL² back when it came out. 
It picks up right after HL²'s ending, which means it doesn't need much introduction or exposition. So it's pedal to the metal right away and that's a good thing.

The problem is that it feels really short, and that's because it is. I believe it's due to the episodic release scheme Valve went for which IMO wasn't a good pick for Half-Life or for Valve for that matter (You know, Valve Time...). We had to wait way too long for Episode 2, with Episode 1 being stuck in the middle of the base game and Ep. 2 in the meantime.
While Episode 2 can stand on its own two feet, Episode 1 cannot due to its short length and the fact that it's the middle point of the HL² "trilogy". 

Still, it's HL². You really can't go wrong with Half-Life², but you need to play the base game first.
Half Life 2 and its episodes are some of the best games I've ever played. They are even better than 99% of the new and most expensive games.

This is garbage. Not worth to even have the name "Half Life". Alyx is super anoying and does tell you what to do, in every step of the game. You can not make her shut up or decide anything for yourself. You even have to wait and listen to her talking to others. Bullshit and the opposite of what Half Life always was about.

Pierwszy dodatek do naszego kochanego symulatora łomiarza.

Kontynuujemy wątek z podstawki, nieznacznie tylko popychając fabułę do przodu. Odczuwam wrażenie, że dużo większy nacisk położono na rozgrywkę, brakuje zaś jakichś bardziej spektakularnych momentów w rozwoju historii. Ot pakiet misji, które utrzymują wysoki poziom znany z podstawki. Przez praktycznie całą przygodę towarzyszy nam nieoceniona Alyx. W jednym momencie jednak można doprowadzić do jej śmierci, czego nie przypominam sobie z podstawki. Nie radzi sobie z hordą przeciwników, wówczas staje się lekkim utrudnieniem ponieważ musimy ją osłaniać w walce.
Będziemy mieli również zadanie związane z eskortą większej grupy ludzi przez non stop atakowane terytoria.
Do dyspozycji oddano nam nowego przeciwnika, jakim jest commnado-zombie. Taki kamikadze, który podbiega do nas z granatem w ręce. Swoją drogą skąd zombie wie jak korzystać z granatu? ;)

Podsumujac, dobry dodatek, trzymający poziom gameplay'u podstawki. Fabularnie nieco odstający, ponieważ niewiele wnosi. Pozycja warta uwagi po przejściu podstawki, nie za długa, nie pozostawi niedosytu, gdyż zostanie nam jeszcze jeden dodatek.

Just beat this game cannot wait to start playing Episode 2. Here are my thoughts on the game: Episode 1 could have used 1 or 2 more chapters I would have really loved to see more of city 17 and more types of enemies. Another Problem I have with this game is that there were no new weapons and we didn't get to see some such as the Antlion Bait thing Would have loved to see that in this game. Overall the game gets a 9/10 from me.
